Class CurrencyLedgerController

java.lang.Object
com.agilebank.controller.CurrencyLedgerController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/bankapi") public class CurrencyLedgerController extends Object

  • Method Details

    • getCurrencyExchangeRate

      @GetMapping("/exchangerate") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<CurrencyLedger.CurrencyPair,BigDecimal>> getCurrencyExchangeRate(@RequestParam(name="currencyOne",required=false) Currency currencyOne, @RequestParam(name="currencyTwo",required=false) Currency currencyTwo, @RequestParam(name="page",required=false,defaultValue="0") @Min(0L) @Min(0L) Integer page, @RequestParam(name="page_size",required=false,defaultValue="10") @Min(1L) @Min(1L) Integer pageSize) throws org.springframework.web.method.annotation.MethodArgumentTypeMismatchException, OneOfTwoCurrenciesMissingException
      GET endpoint for Currency exchange rates.
      Parameters:
      currencyOne - Optional parameter for the first Currency to find the exchange rate of with another Currency.
      currencyTwo - Optional parameter for the second Currency to find the exchange rate of with another Currency.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity over a Map from pairs of Currency instances to BigDecimals representing the cost of purchasing one unit of currencyTwo with units of currencyOne.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.method.annotation.MethodArgumentTypeMismatchException - If the user provides a parameter that does not match one a valid Currency value.
      OneOfTwoCurrenciesMissingException - If exactly one of currencyOne or currencyTwo are null.
